articles.title: Congratulations to Bolivian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Bolivian President
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, in a message on Thursday congratulated Evo Morales Aima upon his reelection as president of the Plurinational State of Bolivia.
					 The message expressed belief that a new turn would be brought about in the development of the DPRK-Bolivia friendly relations.
					
					 It wished the Bolivian president bigger successes in his future work for achieving ceaseless development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Nepali Friendship Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Nepali Friendship Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of Baktapur City of Nepal headed by Ram Mani Bhattarai, administrator of the city, Saturday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the immortal revolutionary career of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round the historic relics preserved there with much care.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Monument to Party Founding, etc.

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Smiling Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Different Units of Kangwon Province
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Smiling Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Different Units of Kangwon Province
 Wonsan, October 18 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and portraying the President's wise leadership were erected in Cholwon, Phangyo and Popdong counties and Ponghwa-ri, Kosong County in Kangwon Province.
					 Mosaics "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us" and "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Will Always Be with Us" were erected in Cholwon, Phangyo and Popdong counties.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il  visited different places of Cholwon County and gave precious instructions for doing farming well and dynamically stepping  up socialist construction by arousing the mental power of masses.
					
					 Kim Il Sung visited Phangyo County during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, clearly indicating the tasks and ways before the county including the issue of increasing agricultural production and sincerely assisting the front and wisely leading the drive for carrying them out.
					
					 He visited Popdong County situated in a remote mountainous area and gave important instructions which served as guidelines for developing the county.
					
					 Mosaic "'The Leader! The Forefront is Ahead'" was erected in Ponghwa-ri, Kosong County. It depicts the great personality of Kim Il Sung as an invincible and iron-willed commander who led the war to victory by traveling to the front despite a hail of bullets and shells.
					
					 Ceremonies of marking their completion took place at the relevant units.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of Cabinet Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of Cabinet Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- There took place an enlarged plenary meeting of the Cabinet of the DPRK. 
					 Present at the meeting were Premier Pak Pong Ju and other members of the Cabinet. 
					
					 Attending it as observers were senior officials and management directors of units under the Cabinet, chairpersons of the provincial, city and county people's committees, chairpersons of the provincial rural economy committees, chairpersons of provincial regional planning commissions, directors of provincial management bureaus of food and consumer goods industries, officials in the field of education and managers of major factories and enterprises.
					
					 The meeting discussed two agenda items "On thoroughly implementing the decision of the Supreme People's Assembly adopted at the second session of the 13th SPA of the DPRK 'On comprehensively enforcing the universal 12-year compulsory education and decisively improving its quality'" and "On the fulfillment of the third quarter yearly national economy plan and measures for fulfilling the fourth quarter yearly national economy plan." 
					
					 Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin made a report on the first item, which was followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un the work for successful enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education has made dynamic progress as a work involving the whole state, all people and the whole society, achieving valuable successes demonstrative of the validity and vitality of the party's policy of attaching importance to education. 
					
					 The meeting proposed tasks for thoroughly implementing the decision of the SPA adopted at the second session of the 13th SPA. 
					
					 Vice-Premier Im Chol Ung made a report on the second item. 
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 The reporter and speakers referred to the successes made in fulfilling the third quarter yearly national economy plan thanks to the surging mental power and devoted labor drive of the working people across the country.
					
					 During the third quarter year, the modern Wisong Scientists Residential Quarter and apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology were built and signal successes were made in major construction sites including large-scale power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River and stockbreeding base in Sepho tableland.
					
					 Many ministries and national institutions, provincial, city and county people's committees and thousands of factories and enterprises honored their third quarter yearly national economy plans and hundreds of factories and enterprises carried out their yearly national economy quotas as of the end of September and the production of dozens of important items grew as compared with that in the corresponding period of last year.
					
					 The meeting indicated measures and ways for successfully carrying out this year's national economy plan.
					
					 It adopted a relevant decision.

articles.title: Ceremony Marks Completion of Apartment Houses for Educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology
articles.content:
Ceremony Marks Completion of Apartment Houses for Educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- There took place a ceremony for marking the completion of the construction of apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology on Saturday.
					 The apartment houses were successfully built on the bank of River Taedong here thanks to the profound loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un who projects the educators as genuine patriots and revolutionaries and provides them with honor and happiness.
					
					 The apartment houses are a good harmony of the Juche character and national identity, originality and convenience and formative art. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officers and soldier-builders of the units of the Korean People's Army which took part in the construction, officials, teachers and researchers of the university.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, made an address.
					
					 The completion of the apartment houses towering high, reflecting the spirit of the country making a leap forward to become an education power and powerhouse of talents marks another auspicious event glorifying this meaningful year featured by a great heyday in construction, he noted, and continued: 
					
					 Modern apartment houses were built for the educators. This strikingly demonstrates the WPK's idea of attaching importance to education and the training of talents.
					
					 He underlined the need for the teachers, researchers and officials of the university to train more pace-setters and standard-bearers in the campaign for pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology as required by the age of knowledge-based economy with such audacious mettle and spirit of national self-esteem as looking out over the world with their feet firmly planted on their land, and thus live up to the party's great benevolence. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the houses.

articles.title: DPRK Consulate General in Nakhodka Gives Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Consulate General in Nakhodka Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka, Russia hosted a reception on Oct. 10 on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were personages of the office of the Russian Foreign Ministry in Vladivostok,   Ministry of Development of Far East and the Maritime Territory Administration.
					
					 The DPRK consul general and staff members of the consulate general in Nakhodka were on hand.
					
					 A reception was also given at the branch of the DPRK consulate general in Khabarovsk on Oct. 14.

articles.title: Ri Po Ik, Grandmother of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Ri Po Ik, Grandmother of Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- It has been 55 years since the demise of Ri Po Ik, grandmother of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Ri Po Ik educated all her children and grandchildren in the anti-Japanese patriotic idea and saw them off on the road to revolution, withstanding all sorts of trials and misfortune.  
					
					 In his reminiscences "With the Century", Kim Il Sung said:
					
					 "In the summer of 1926, the year of my father's death, she came to mourn over his death in front of his grave at Yangdicun in Fusong, where she said to me:
					
					 'Jungson (grandson), you will have to take over the burden your father was carrying now. You must pick up the cause where he left off and win back the country, come what may. You may have no chance to take care of me or your mother, as is your filial duty, but you must give yourself heart and soul to the cause of Korea's independence.'"
					
					 The Japanese "surrender hunting team" hauled her around the mountains of West Jiandao for nearly a full year to persuade her grandson, who was carrying on an anti-Japanese armed struggle, to surrender.
					
					 "Whenever the enemy poked her in the back with a rifle butt to make her call out her grandson's name, she retorted, 'I don't know how to blabber wild nonsense like that. Anyway, do you think you can kill me and get off scot-free? Go ahead, kill me if you want to end up with my grandson's bullet in your skulls!'", Kim Il Sung said in the reminiscences, adding:
					
					 "On New Year's Day, the Japanese superintendent of the 'surrender hunting team' told its agents that he would like to be offered New Year's greetings from General Kim's grandmother and ordered them to fetch her. 
					
					 Hearing this, she smiled coldly and retorted, 'What nonsense! Tell the ill-bred fellow to come and bow his New Year's greetings to me!'".
					
					 With firm determination that she even had to devote her life for the sake of the country and the nation, she never yielded to any coercive power or injustice. 
					
					 Now the people in the DPRK are recalling with deep emotion her contribution to the liberation of the country.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Ri Po Ik
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Ri Po Ik
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of Ri Po Ik, grandmother of President Kim Il Sung, in Mangyongdae on Saturday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of her death.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), servicepersons, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and those of party and power bodies and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Wreaths were placed before her grave in the name of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Il Sung Military University, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, party and power bodies and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence, looking back on her noble life.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Society Marks Its 68th Birthday
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Society Marks Its 68th Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 68th anniversary of the DPRK Red Cross Society, which was founded in October Juche 35 (1946) on the initiative of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Since its birth the DPRK Red Cross Society has creditably performed its mission as an active assistant to the government by conducting such works as health and hygienic, relief and anti-epidemic activities, program for repatriation of Japan-resident Koreans, and humanitarian assistance to compatriots in the south of Korea and other countries.
					
					 At present, the Society is playing a major role in the nationwide projects for disaster prevention and contingency planning, rehabilitation and development.
					
					 It also helps the state health service organs' work to prevent various diseases and improve the inhabitants' health under the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of preventive medicine. And it, in cooperation with the State Academy of Sciences and other institutions, conducts such works conducive to the improvement of people's livelihood as construction of greenhouses and mushroom farms and introduction of the agro-forestry management.
					
					 As a member of the International Red Cross and Red Crescent Movement, the DPRK Red Cross Society has strengthened the friendly and cooperative relationship with international Red Cross bodies and other countries' Red Cross and Red Crescent organizations. It joined the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies on May 11, 1956.

articles.title: National Amateur Paduk (Go) Contest Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
National Amateur Paduk (Go) Contest Begins in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A national amateur paduk (go) contest began at the Taekwon-Do Hall in Pyongyang on Saturday.
					 Taking part in the contest, classified into mixed doubles, team and individual events, are more than 200 amateurs selected from Pyongyang and provinces. It is divided into five groups by age.
					
					 Mixed doubles event is to start on October 19 and individual event on October 20.
					
					 Ri Pong Il, deputy secretary general of the Korean Paduk Association, told KCNA that the contest, the first of its kind, would offer a good occasion in improving the paduk technique and raising the public interest in paduk.
					
					 The contest will last until October 22.

articles.title: DPRK Team Beats Its Japanese Rival at Asian U-19 Football Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Team Beats Its Japanese Rival at Asian U-19 Football Championship
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team beat its Japanese rival 6:5 at the quarter-finals in the 2014 Asian U-19 Football Championship now under way in Myanmar.
					 It tied its Oman rival 1:1 and trounced its Iraqi rival 2:1, coming second in the group.
					
					 It drew with its Japanese rival 1:1 at the first and second halves of the match and extra-time play. In the penalty shoot-out the DPRK team beat its Japanese rival 5:4.
					
					 So, it is qualified to participate in the FIFA U-20 World Cup to be held in New Zealand next year.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Forever in High Esteem and Accomplish His Cause."
					 The work, published on Oct. 16, Juche 83 (1994), indicates the tasks and ways for defending the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and accomplishing it to the last, including the issue of consolidating the party and strengthening the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses, the issue of thoroughly carrying out the party's revolutionary economic strategy and the issue of strengthening the People's Army and establishing the social trait of attaching importance to military affairs.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul with noble sense of moral obligation unprecedented in history to make sure that the revolutionary history of the President had been given a steady continuity. His undying revolutionary exploits serve as the eternal treasure to be handed down forever along with the history of prospering socialist Korea.
					
					 He, who set a noble example in carrying forward the idea and cause of the leader, most successfully settled the cause of immortality of the leader, wisely led the work to translate the President's desire into brilliant reality and did all works as intended by him and the way he did from A to Z.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the paramount incarnation of revolutionary moral obligation as he set a noble example in immortalizing the leader unprecedented in the history of human politics out of the noblest sense of moral obligation.
					
					 The article calls on all officials, party members and other people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Reckless Attempt at Nuclear War under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Reckless Attempt at Nuclear War under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Data proving the U.S. attempt for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK was disclosed recently. In 2011 the then U.S. Secretary of Defense Panetta informed the south Korean puppet forces of the U.S. stand to "use nuclear weapons if necessary in case of contingency", ballyhooing "nuclear and missile threats from the north". It was also disclosed that he received from the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea a report that the U.S. scenario for a war against the DPRK included a "program for using nukes" when he visited south Korea in 2010 as director of the CIA.
					 This clearly judges who is the arch criminal working to impose nuclear disaster upon the Korean nation while escalating the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Lurking behind the U.S. opening to media of its attempt at a nuclear war against the DPRK at present is a very sinister aim. 
					
					 Now the inter-Korean relations are on the crucial crossroads of improvement or collapse. All Koreans at home and abroad and the international community fully support and welcome the opportunity for improvement of the north-south relations provided by the DPRK's broadminded and initiative efforts. However, the U.S., displeased with improved inter-Korean relations, made public its plan to use nuclear weapons against the DPRK in a bid to hype the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, prod the south Korean puppet authorities into escalating military tension and step up the preparations for a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					 Now that the U.S. nuclear war moves have reached a reckless phase, the DPRK will further bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence and surely win the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. with nuclear treasured sword. 
					
					 The reckless attempt of the U.S. imperialist maniacs to ignite a nuclear war is bound to go bankrupt.

articles.title: It Is Time for S. Korean Authorities to Comprehend Law of World: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
It Is Time for S. Korean Authorities to Comprehend Law of World: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Hwang Jun Guk, chief delegate of south Korea to the six-party talks, and Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affaires of south Korea, are very busy supporting the U.S. nuclear campaign. 
					 Hwang at a recent academic symposium uttered that for more than two decades "the north's nuclear adventure reduced all north Koreans to hostages of nukes." Slandering the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, he talked rubbish that "he would seek his original solution to the nuclear issue of the north together with participating countries of the six-party talks while increasing pressure on the north".
					
					 Yun at a ministerial event related to "human rights" in the north sponsored by the U.S. secretary of State trumpeted that "the north's development of nuclear weapons threatening peace and assertion for improvement of human rights are contradictory." Crying out for coping with "missile threat from the north" and "threat of additional nuclear test," he is calling for "a joint counter-action" in the international arena. 
					
					 What they uttered is nothing but ridiculous jargons of faithful stooges of the U.S. and its servants in the nuclear campaign. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the DPRK's decision to have access to nukes is the inevitable results of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, its nuclear threat and strategy for stifling the DPRK for more than half a century. 
					
					 The U.S. turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East and a nuclear outpost. On this basis, the U.S. worked out a variety of operation plans for attacking the DPRK with nukes and is putting them into practice. 
					
					 The U.S. stages every year joint military drills under various codenames including Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian with south Korea. Means for a nuclear war huge enough to carry out a war are involved in the drills. 
					
					 In its "nuclear posture review" the U.S. listed the DPRK as a target of preemptive nuclear attack and worked out even a war scenario calling for the use of nukes against the DPRK in case of "contingency". 
					
					 The Korean people have been exposed to the biggest nuclear threat of the U.S. 
					
					 Had not the Korean people have access to nuclear deterrence under such situation, how miserable their destiny would have been and what dangerous phase the situation on the Korean Peninsula would have reached. 
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat is making all Koreans nuclear hostages and the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is the most righteous one for defusing the nuclear war threats on the Korean Peninsula and reliably ensuring peace and security of the Korean nation.
					
					 A war is deterred on the peninsula and peace and security have been preserved in the Asia-Pacific region thanks to the DPRK's nuclear deterrence which is physically checking the war moves of the U.S. and its followers. 
					
					 Those who do not know about this are either politically blind ones ignorant of the law of the world or traitors leaving all the interests of the nation to the tender mercy of outsiders. 
					
					 No interests would be thinkable apart from national sovereignty and vital rights. 
					
					 The servants of the outsiders' nuclear campaign would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and stop at once their despicable acts of treachery.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Authorities Hell-bent on Beefing up Forces for Pre-emptive Attack
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Authorities Hell-bent on Beefing up Forces for Pre-emptive Attack
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military authorities are keen on beefing up forces for pre-emptive attack.
					 According to south Korean KBS on Oct. 15, the south Korean marine corps has pushed forward the establishment of a high-speed task force under the pretence of coping with "surprise attack" by someone.
					
					 Entering this year, the marine corps has mapped out a plan to form a task force with high-speed warships and is mulling deploying them in the waters off the islands situated in hotspot area of the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 Those islands have also been reinforced with a new radar system and shoulder fire missiles.
					
					 It was reported that the south Korean air force is contemplating obtaining two AWACS which may play a pivotal role in the establishment of pre-emptive attack system while the navy plans to form what it called the submarine command.

articles.title: Brazilian Organization Introduces Human Rights Situation in DPRK
articles.content:
Brazilian Organization Introduces Human Rights Situation in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Guarantee of human rights in DPRK" illustrated with a photo showing the panoramic view of Pyongyang City on its website on Oct. 9.
					 The article said:
					
					 All citizens of 17 years and upward in the DPRK have the rights to elect or to be elected irrespective of sex, nationality, occupation, property status, education, party affiliation, political view and religious belief.
					
					 Political rights of the people are ensured in the DPRK on the highest level.
					
					 They are free to take part in political activities and the rights of media, publication, meeting and religious belief are guaranteed by law.
					
					 It is the DPRK where all members of the society are fully enjoying all rights including the right to work and rest and the right to free education and free medical care.
					
					 Everyone in this country which ensures universal 12-year compulsory education system enjoys the right to learning to his or her heart's content.
					
					 The state is paying deep attention to building dwelling houses for the people. It is also taking care of the old with no supporters, children and the disabled in a responsible manner. Women have equal rights with men.
					
					 Human rights are fully guaranteed in the DPRK as it is guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 The Juche idea considers man as the most powerful and valuable being in the world and requires everything to serve people.
					
					 It is quite natural that human rights are ensured on the highest level in the country guided by this idea.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Finland
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Finland
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the Juche idea was held in Helsinki on October 9 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). It was sponsored by the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue of the seminar were the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Displayed there also were their works and books and photos introducing the validity and vitality of the Juche idea.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Finnish Communists' League and the Finland-Korea Society and other people.
					
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the WPK has won victory after victory, foiling the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and overcoming all difficulties, guided by the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and developed and enriched by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, noted in a speech.
					
					 The revolutionary idea of the President has served as a cornerstone in building the WPK. Thanks to this great idea of relying on the popular masses the WPK could achieve the historic causes.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, led the Korean revolution to victory by carrying forward the revolutionary idea of the President.
					
					 Today the WPK is powerfully arousing the Korean people to the struggle for the final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Meetings and photo exhibitions took place at the Kim Il Sung Kindergarten in Ovorhangay Province of Mongolia and by the Bangladesh People's League and the Secretariat of the Uganda National Resistance Movement on October 6 and 8 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the party-building leadership feats and Songun leadership feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the struggle of the Korean army and people to build a thriving nation.
					
					 Present there were personages of various strata and other people of the relevant countries.
					
					 The director of the kindergarten in Mongolia expressed the will to always take the lead in the work to bring up children and develop the friendly relations with the DPRK as befitting the unit which goes by the august name of the great man.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said:
					
					 The 69 year-long history of the WPK which was founded and developed by Kim Il Sung is the glorious history in which it has demonstrated its might as the steel-strong party, the invincible party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il thoroughly applied the Juche idea and the Songun idea into the party work and activities in the whole period of his leadership over the WPK, true to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 I wish the WPK and the Korean people greater achievements in the struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers noted with appreciation that the WPK has developed into the ever-victorious powerful party, meeting all challenges of history under the wise leadership of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: WPK Lauded by British Organization
articles.content:
WPK Lauded by British Organization
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article on its website on October 7 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The WPK is regarding Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the guidelines of its activities, the article said.
					
					 The WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has triumphantly advanced under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea, it noted.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il consolidated the WPK into the ideological pure entity remaining true to the idea and cause of the President, it said, and went on:
					
					 The might of the WPK admired by the world lies in its unity. The tradition of this unity was established by the President and it was strengthened into the solid organizational and ideological unity based on one idea and pure moral obligation thanks to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK is enjoying absolute support and trust of the people because it has been built into the party serving them.
					
					 It is the maxim of the President that if one believes in the people and relies on them, one wins victory.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that the aspiration and wishes of the people were reflected in the line and policies of the WPK by applying the President's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 The large flower garden of loving care for the people is blooming in the DPRK and eye-opening changes are being created there in the drive for building a thriving nation thanks to Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, who has successfully carried forward the idea and cause of the President and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DIU Anniversary Marked by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
DIU Anniversary Marked by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "88th anniversary of Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU)" on its website on October 8.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Korean revolution which started by DIU under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung has dynamically advanced along the road of independence, Songun and unity.
					
					 Independence is the fundamental principle and stand of the Korean revolution put up by DIU.
					
					 The President who founded the Juche idea in the first period of his revolutionary activities implemented the idea and principle of independence in the whole period when he led the Korean revolution.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the Workers' Party of Korea conducted its activities independently and creatively to meet the interests of the people and to suit the reality of the country, guided by the Juche idea, and thus made the Korean people always win victories in accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					 Songun is the immutable banner of the Korean revolution which most transparently applied DIU's idea of anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 The President consistently adhered to the idea and line on attaching importance to the arms and military affairs from the first days of making the revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il pursued the original Songun politics by successfully carrying forward the President's idea and line on attaching importance to the military affairs which originated from the programme of DIU.
					
					 Unity is the mainstay of the Korean revolution DIU put up as the immutable truth of certain victory.
					
					 DIU made a new history of unity and cohesion around the leader. So, the DPRK turned into a country which formed a harmonious whole unbreakable even with nuclear weapons, a large harmonious socialist family in which people help and lead each other forward.
					
					 Only victory and glory are always in store for socialist Korea dignified for independence, powerful thanks to Songun politics and unbreakable for the single-minded unity.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Marked by Bulgarian Figure
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Marked by Bulgarian Figure
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, released a statement on October 7 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung formed Down-with-Imperialism Union, a new type revolutionary organization, in the early period of his revolutionary activities and provided the organizational and ideological groundwork for party founding in the flames of the revolutionary struggle against the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 The greatest feat performed by him is that he successfully realized the cause of party building by meeting all challenges after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 The founding of the WPK made it possible for the Korean people to have the staff of the revolution in the struggle to build a new society.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause pioneered by the President and pursued the Songun policy in all fields, firmly defending socialism in the acute confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist reactionary forces in the grim situation where socialism collapsed in some countries late in the last century.
					
					 I am convinced that the Korean people would continue registering great achievements in the efforts to firmly defend socialism, build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the leadership of the WPK headed by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Celebrated at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Celebrated at DPRK Missions Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Friendship meetings, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place at DPRK missions in Nakhodka of Russia, Uzbekistan, Senegal, Equatorial Guinea and Peru between October 3 and 7 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the party-building leadership feats and Songun leadership feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and photos and books introducing the might of the ever-victorious WPK.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Okryu Children's Hospital".
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of various strata, Juche idea followers and members of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in relevant countries. Officials of DPRK missions were on hand.
					
					 A vice-mayor of Nakhodka of Russia said that since its foundation the WPK has pursued the policies of giving priority to the interests of the people.
					
					 The second secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation noted that the cause of the Korean people for building a thriving nation is sure to be realized under the leadership of the great party.
					
					 A member of the Political Bureau of the Socialist Party of Senegal and other speakers said that Kim Jong Un is the great man recognized by the world, adding that the single-minded unity of the Korean people, rallied close around the leader, is more powerful than nuclear weapons.
					
					 The general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru noted that the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be everlasting.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente boliviano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente boliviano
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 16 un mensaje de felicitacion a Evo Morales Aima reelecto como presidente de Bolivia.
					El remitente, en su misiva, expresa la conviccion de que se producira un nuevo viraje en el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-Bolivia.
					
					Desea al destinatario mayores exitos en sus futuros trabajos para el desarrollo continuo y prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: AEDH denuncia campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles
articles.content:
AEDH denuncia campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles
						
　Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos (AEDH) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 17 una declaracion como sigue:
					　El informe de la AEDH de la RPDC fue distribuido como documento oficial de la Asamblea General, el Consejo de Seguridad y el Consejo de DDHH, de la ONU.
					
					　Tan pronto como se publicara este informe que narra historica, sistematica y generalmente sobre las caracteristicas del regimen socialista de nuestro pais centrado en las masas populares, la politica de aseguramiento de DDHH y el estado de disfrute de DDHH de los habitantes, provoca gran apoyo y simpatia de la sociedad internacional.
					
					　Numerosos medios de prensa del mundo transmiten ampliamente el texto completo y el contenido principal del informe y el hecho de que tuvieron lugar en Nueva York y otros lugares los actos de informacion para dar a conocer la situacion de DDHH y la posicion de la RPDC en esta rama.
					
					　Muchos paises califican el informe de un documento que muestra globalmente el ventajoso estado de DDHH de la RPDC y prestan atencion a los esfuerzos de la RPDC por fomentar mas el disfrute de DDHH de las masas populares y fortalecer la cooperacion internacional.
					
					　Por otra parte, ridiculizan y denuncian el "informe del comite de investigacion" sobre la situacion de DDHH en la RPDC inventado con presunciones y malevolencia a base de "testimonios" individuales de los estafadores "fugitivos norcoreanos" sin hablar nada de la politica estatal, el regimen, la voluntad y los esfuerzos de cooperacion internacional de la RPDC por la proteccion y el fomento de DDHH.
					
					　El "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC que la EU, Japon y otras fuerzas hostiles intentan someter a la consideracion de la Asamblea General de la ONU es el modelo de la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero en el trato de DDHH.
					
					　Por tanto, se oyen las voces de que los paises que desean la proteccion y el fomento de verdaderos DDHH deben o deberan rechazarlo merecidamente.
					
					　Pero, las fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC encabezadas por EE.UU. actuan obstinadamente para despreciar intencionalmente el informe de la RPDC y enfocar al "informe del comite de investigacion".
					
					　Esto partio de vil proposito de prevenir la propaganda de la realidad y la justa insistencia de la RPDC, manchar la imagen de ella y realizar la intencion de derribar el regimen de la RPDC y prueba otra vez la verdad de que DDHH son precisamente la soberania estatal.
					
					　Sacamos la conclusion de que para ofrecerles a las masas populares los verdaderos DDHH, se debe defender firmemente la soberania del pais y enfrentarse fuertemente a las fuerzas hostiles que intentan intervenir en los asuntos internos bajo el rotulo de la "defensa de DDHH".
					
					　Son intolerables la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero para usar DDHH, valor universal de la humanidad, en malsanos propositos politicos.
					
					　La campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles provoca gran colera de los habitantes de la RPDC.
					
					　La RPDC seguira esforzandose por frustrar rotundamente las maquinaciones de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles, defender firmemente el regimen socialista al estilo coreano mas ventajoso y asegurar a los habitantes las mas excelentes condiciones de disfrute de DDHH.

articles.title: CRPP condena disparate de Park Geun-hye dicho en cumbre Asia-Europa
articles.content:
CRPP condena disparate de Park Geun-hye dicho en cumbre Asia-Europa
						
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que la mandataria surcoreana censuro a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la cumbre Asia-Europa, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio el dia 17 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					En su reciente gira al extranjero, Park Geun-hye volvio a censurar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En la cumbre Asia-Europa sesionada en Milano de Italia, dijo unos chismes como "cambio verdadero del Norte de Corea", "este debe abrir sus puertas cerradas deponiendo el arma nuclear", "los derechos humanos y la vida dura de la poblacion norcoreana" y "el Norte de Corea debe proceder al dialogo con sinceridad saliendo de la dualidad".
					
					Esta chismografia rompe el dificilmente preparado ambiente de dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas, siendo otra imperdonable provocacion politica contra la RPDC.
					
					Como demuestra la realidad, EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana ejercen realmente la amenaza nuclear a la RPDC y estan desesperados para aislarla y encerrarla abogando por la "sancion".
					
					El plan de uso de armas nucleares de EE.UU., conocido a traves de las memorias del ex secretario de Defensa norteamericano, Panetta, muestra claramente que de quien proviene la amenaza nuclear y cual es la amenaza nuclear que debe ser eliminada primero para lograr la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Es un sofisma descarado que Park insistiera en la "amenaza nuclear" de la parte connacional, haciendo vista gorda de la misma de su amo gringo.
					
					Ella es condenada por todo el mundo por haber engendrado las tragedias como el caso del ferry "Sewol" y convertido el territorio surcoreano en el infierno de DDHH y en la tierra de vida depauperada. Por lo tanto, no tiene derecho a hablar de los "DDHH" y los "sufrimientos de los habitantes" de alguien.
					
					Ademas resulta el climax de dualidad hablar en lugares publicos del dialogo y calumniar a la contraparte a las espaldas.
					
					Hay que observar la cortesia elemental sobre la contraparte para sostener el dialogo y mejorar las relaciones de ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Si Park desea de veras el dialogo y la mejora de relaciones con la RPDC, no debe decir las palabras que los obstaculizan.
					
					Ella debe tener presente que su vicio de chismear puede llevar a la ruptura total las relaciones N-S.

articles.title: Levantados murales de mosaico con imagenes de Generalisimos en provincia de Kangwon
articles.content:
Levantados murales de mosaico con imagenes de Generalisimos en provincia de Kangwon
						
Wonsan, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- Fueron levantados los murales de mosaico con imagenes de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, intitulados "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung vive siempre en nosotros" y "El gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il vive siempre en nosotros", en los distritos de Cholwon, Phangyo y Popdong de la provincia de Kangwon.
					En varios puntos del distrito de Cholwon estan grabadas las hazanas inmortales del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il que dieron en el terreno preciosas instrucciones de labrar bien la tierra y acelerar con dinamismo la construccion del socialismo movilizando la fuerza espiritual de las masas.
					
					El Presidente visito el distrito de Phangyo en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y en esa ocasion indico las tareas y los remedios, que corresponden al distrito incluyendo el problema de aumentar la produccion agricola y ayudar bien al frente,  y condujo sabiamente las labores por materializarlos.
					
					En el recondito distrito montanoso de Popdong, el dio instrucciones que sirvieron de guia en el desarrollo del distrito.
					
					Para trasmitir eternamente las huellas de direccion de los Generalisimos, los funcionarios y los trabajadores de los distritos arriba mencionados levantaron los murales de mosaico con imagenes sonrientes de esos grandes hombres sin pares.
					
					En el mural de mosaico erguido en la comuna de Ponghwa del distrito de Kosong "'!Lider! Por delante esta la primera linea del frente", estan descritas las cualidades de gran hombre sin par del Comandante Invencible Kim Il Sung quien condujo a la victoria la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria recorriendo el frente bajo la lluvia de balas.
					
					Tuvieron lugar en las respectivas unidades las ceremonias de inauguracion de los murales.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion ampliada del pleno de Consejo de Ministros
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion ampliada del pleno de Consejo de Ministros
						
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la reunion ampliada del pleno del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Participacion el premier Pak Pong Ju y otros miembros del Consejo de Ministros y asistieron como observadores los funcionarios directivos de los organismos adscritos directamente al Consejo de Ministros, los titulares de las Direcciones, los presidentes de los comites populares provinciales, urbanos y distritales, los comites provinciales de economia rural, los comites provinciales de planificacion, los titulares de las Direcciones Provinciales de Industria Alimentaria y de Articulos de Uso Diario, los funcionarios de la rama de educacion y los gerentes de las fabricas y empresas importantes. 
					
					La reunion discutio la siguiente agenda: "Para ejecutar cabalmente la resolucion de la Asamblea Popular Suprema ´Para implementar generalmente la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos y elevar decisivamente su calidad´, aprobada en el segundo periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC" y "Sobre el cumplimiento del plan de economia nacional para el tercer trimestre y las medidas para el cumplimiento del plan de economia nacional para el cuarto trimestre". 
					
					El vicepremier Kim Yong Jin presento el informe sobre el primer punto de la agenda y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores mencionaron que bajo la sabia orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se promueven las labores para implementar con exito la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos como las de todo el pais, todo el pueblo y toda la sociedad. 
					
					Asi se han alcanzado valiosos exitos que manifiestan la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica del partido de dar importancia a la educacion, recalcaron. 
					
					La reunion ampliada presento las tareas para ejecutar plenamente la resolucion de la APS aprobada en el segundo periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS. 
					
					El informe sobre el segundo punto estuvo a cargo del vicepremier Im Chol Ung y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores enumeraron que gracias al elevado espiritu y esfuerzos abnegados de todos los trabajadores del pais, se han logrado exitos en el cumplimiento del plan de economia nacional en el tercer trimestre. 
					
					En ese lapso se han levantado modernamente la zona de viviendas para cientificos Wisong y las viviendas para educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y registrado las innovaciones en los campos de construccion de importantes objetos como las plantas hidroelectricas escalonadas del rio Chongchon y la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho. 
					
					Muchos ministerios, organos centrales,  comites populares provinciales, urbanos y distritales, miles de fabricas y empresas sobrecumplieron el plan de economia nacional para el tercer trimestre.
					
					Mientras tanto, cientos de fabricas y empresas cumplieron con antelacion hasta finales de septiembre el plan anual de economia nacional y la produccion de decenas de reglones importantes ha crecido en comparacion con el mismo periodo del ano pasado. 
					
					La reunion presento las medidas y remedios para cumplir con exito el plan anual de economia nacional. 
					
					Fue aprobada en ella la resolucion correspondiente.
